Package arcade.sim

Class Series

java.lang.Object
arcade.sim.Series
public class Series
extends java.lang.Object
Container for a series of Simulation objects, differing only in random seed.

The class is instantiated by parsing an XML document specifying model setup. Constructors for the Simulation objects are built, but not called until the series is run. Series objects that are not valid are marked as skip and are not run.

Simulation objects are passed their parent Series object and have access to fields with the "_" prefix.

Since:
2.2
Version:
2.2.X

  • Constructor Details

    • Series

      public Series​(java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,​MiniBox> setupDicts, java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,​java.util.ArrayList<MiniBox>> setupLists, Box parameters, boolean vis)
      Creates a Series object given setup information parsed from XML.
      Parameters:
      setupDicts - the map of attribute to value for single instance tags
      setupLists - the map of attribute to value for multiple instance tags
      parameters - the default parameter values loaded from parameter.xml
      vis - indicates if simulations are to be run with visualization
